solution_line_template: If there are {total_people} people in the house, the number of people eating pizza is {pizza_eaters_fraction}*{total_people} = <<{pizza_eaters_fraction}*{total_people}={people_eating_pizza}>>{people_eating_pizza} people.

If each house member who eats pizza took {pieces_per_person} pieces to eat, the number of pieces taken is {pieces_per_person}*{people_eating_pizza} = <<{pieces_per_person}*{people_eating_pizza}={total_pieces_taken}>>{total_pieces_taken} pieces.

Since the total number of pieces was {initial_pizza_pieces}, the number of pieces not taken is {initial_pizza_pieces}-{total_pieces_taken} = <<{initial_pizza_pieces}-{total_pieces_taken}={remaining_pizza_pieces}>>{remaining_pizza_pieces} pieces.
